content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 2, 0) - Currently out of fuel, with 33 iron-ore in inventory.
- Stone furnace (position 4, 0) - Currently out of fuel, with 24 iron-ore and 10 iron-plate in inventory.
- Stone furnace (position 6, 0) - Working, with 50 iron-ore and full output inventory of iron-plate.

### Iron plate factory at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 0, 0) - Currently has 8 coal in fuel inventory and no ingredients to smelt.

### Iron ore mine at position(x)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) - Extracting iron ore.
- Burner mining drill (position x2) - Extracting iron ore.
- Burner mining drill (position x3) - Extracting iron ore.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has available inventory space before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the furnace at position (6, 0) was full when trying to insert iron-ore.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Repeated errors with furnace insertions
- The agent repeatedly encountered issues inserting iron-ore into the furnace at position (6, 0). Check the furnace's inventory status before attempting to insert items.
